#summary How to use Darkstar in a Maven project.
#labels Featured

= Vanilla Darkstar =

To use the vanilla version of Project Darkstar within a [http://maven.apache.org/ Maven] project, add the following lines to your POM file:

{{{
    <repositories>
        <repository>
            <id>orfjackal</id>
            <url>http://repo.orfjackal.net/maven2</url>
        </repository>
    </repositories>

    <dependencies>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.projectdarkstar</groupId>
            <artifactId>darkstar-server</artifactId>
            <version>0.9.6</version>
            <scope>provided</scope>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.projectdarkstar</groupId>
            <artifactId>darkstar-client</artifactId>
            <version>0.9.6</version>
            <scope>provided</scope>
        </dependency>
    <dependencies>
}}}
